tool_description: Registers a domain name with specified registrar, contact information, and registration settings including privacy protection and auto-renewal.

domain_name.description: Full domain name to register (e.g., example.com)

registrar.description: Registrar service to use (namecheap, godaddy, cloudflare, etc.)

registration_years.description: Number of years to register the domain (1-10)

registrant_name.description: Full name of the domain registrant

registrant_email.description: Email address of the domain registrant

registrant_phone.description: Phone number of the domain registrant

country.description: Country code of the registrant (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2)

error_messages: Domain not available: The specified domain name is not available for registration.
Invalid registrar: The specified registrar is not supported or available.
Registration years out of range: Registration period must be between 1 and 10 years.
Invalid contact information: Registrant details must be complete and valid.
Invalid country code: Country must be a valid ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code.
Payment method required: Valid payment information must be provided to complete registration.
Registrar API error: The registrar service encountered an error during registration.
usage: Provide the domain name, registrar, registration period, and complete registrant contact information. Enable privacy protection and auto-renewal as needed. The tool will attempt to register the domain and return registration details.

registration_id.description: Unique registration identifier from the registrar

expiration_date.description: Domain expiration date in ISO format

nameservers.description: Default nameservers assigned to the domain
